column4: Anyone know why I can't seem to adjust the brightness/contrast in either totem-gstreamer or xine? Dapper, so I'm wondering if that's a known issue ATM.
Edit->Preferences->Display, that's where you can setup video contrast/brightness
I did, but the display stays the same when I move the slider.
they are the current versions in Dapper, so I was wondering if that's a known issue, or I have something wrong.  :)
